054125aa-d017-4def-989a-62e302881497.name: 战斗反射
054125aa-d017-4def-989a-62e302881497.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

e3c48881-5d55-4fd7-af8e-8c2dc6f340fd.name: 易于命中
e3c48881-5d55-4fd7-af8e-8c2dc6f340fd.notes: 其他人可以将你的双眼作为攻击目标仅受到 -6 命中减值

3242c977-2276-4d03-93fa-dcaf18f5712f.name: Either one of the other three choices or 15 points chosen from

4c48431d-c061-475d-9e88-227d3db827c0.name: 健康
4c48431d-c061-475d-9e88-227d3db827c0.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

ed94c553-95d5-4520-9a35-8d9960b67c84.name: Fit, Very
ed94c553-95d5-4520-9a35-8d9960b67c84.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

9a1e80a6-f0f5-44bc-9fa5-8ce1505159b4.name: 高痛阈
9a1e80a6-f0f5-44bc-9fa5-8ce1505159b4.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

7952ed75-8fca-448d-abaf-b1945dfdb479.name: 影响人群
7952ed75-8fca-448d-abaf-b1945dfdb479.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

39ea1401-de93-42f8-babd-d196aa7bf059.name: 邪恶双生子
39ea1401-de93-42f8-babd-d196aa7bf059.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大或拥有你没有的能力

3a6c39ff-7012-4c97-983c-109b50d87e74.name: 邪恶双生子
3a6c39ff-7012-4c97-983c-109b50d87e74.notes: 在你拥有的能力上更加强大且拥有你没有的能力

2fef37e0-1534-4b03-88cf-57ae86c802de.name: 影响人群
2fef37e0-1534-4b03-88cf-57ae86c802de.notes: 几乎所有人，刨去@一大群人@

9cc8cbc1-4a80-41d2-813a-91ce7775d862.name: Judo
9cc8cbc1-4a80-41d2-813a-91ce7775d862.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。
